display_html:
data BlockHeader = BlockHeader {
  • version :: Word16
  • contentSize :: Word32
  • slot :: SlotId
  • chainLength :: Word32
  • contentHash :: Hash "content"
  • headerHash :: Hash "BlockHeader"
  • parentHeaderHash :: Hash "BlockHeader"
  • producedBy :: Maybe PoolId
}
name: BlockHeader BlockHeader version headerHash parentHeaderHash slot contentSize chainLength contentHash producedBy

display_html:
data ConfigParam
  • = Block0Date StartTime
  • | ConfigDiscrimination Discrimination
  • | Consensus ConsensusVersion
  • | SlotsPerEpoch EpochLength
  • | SlotDuration NominalDiffTime
  • | EpochStabilityDepth (Quantity "block" Word32)
  • | ConsensusGenesisPraosParamF Milli
  • | MaxNumberOfTransactionsPerBlock Word32
  • | BftSlotsRatio Milli
  • | AddBftLeader LeaderId
  • | RemoveBftLeader LeaderId
  • | AllowAccountCreation Bool
  • | ConfigLinearFee FeePolicy
  • | ProposalExpiration (Quantity "epoch" Word32)
  • | KesUpdateSpeed (Quantity "second/update" Word32)
  • | ConfigPerCertificate PerCertificateFee
  • | ConfigRewardFormula RewardFormula
  • | TreasuryTax TaxParameters
  • | ConfigRewardLimit RewardLimit
  • | ConfigPoolCapping PoolCapping
  • | UnimplementedConfigParam Word16
name: ConfigParam Block0Date ConfigDiscrimination Consensus SlotsPerEpoch SlotDuration EpochStabilityDepth ConsensusGenesisPraosParamF MaxNumberOfTransactionsPerBlock BftSlotsRatio AddBftLeader RemoveBftLeader AllowAccountCreation ConfigLinearFee ProposalExpiration KesUpdateSpeed ConfigPerCertificate ConfigRewardFormula TreasuryTax ConfigRewardLimit ConfigPoolCapping UnimplementedConfigParam

display_html:
data Fragment
  • = Initial [ConfigParam]
  • | Transaction Tx
  • | StakeDelegation (StakeDelegationType, ChimericAccount, Tx)
  • | PoolRegistration (PoolId, [PoolOwner], TaxParameters, Tx)
  • | UnimplementedFragment Word8
name: Fragment PoolRegistration Transaction Initial StakeDelegation UnimplementedFragment

data JormungandrClient m = JormungandrClient {
  • getAccountState :: Hash "Account" -> ExceptT ErrGetAccountState m AccountState
  • getTipId :: ExceptT ErrNetworkUnavailable m (Hash "BlockHeader")
  • getBlock :: Hash "BlockHeader" -> ExceptT ErrGetBlock m Block
  • getDescendantIds :: Hash "BlockHeader" -> Word -> ExceptT ErrGetDescendants m [Hash "BlockHeader"]
  • postMessage :: SealedTx -> ExceptT ErrPostTx m ()
  • getInitialBlockchainParameters :: Hash "Genesis" -> ExceptT ErrGetBlockchainParams m (Block, BlockchainParameters)
  • getStakeDistribution :: EpochNo -> ExceptT ErrNetworkUnavailable m StakeApiResponse
}

data Tracers' f = Tracers {
  • applicationTracer :: f ApplicationLog
  • apiServerTracer :: f ApiLog
  • walletEngineTracer :: f (WorkerLog WalletId WalletLog)
  • walletDbTracer :: f DBLog
  • stakePoolEngineTracer :: f (WorkerLog Text StakePoolLog)
  • stakePoolDbTracer :: f DBLog
  • networkTracer :: f NetworkLayerLog
  • daedalusIPCTracer :: f DaedalusIPCLog
  • ntpClientTracer :: f NtpTrace
}
